name: Temple Raider (itch) (MattVonFat)
description:
This is my entry for the Godot Wild Jam #54.

I'm pretty happy with it for the first project I've "completed". Graphics aren't really my strong point, I didn't get to add all the enemies I wanted, and there's only two sound effects... but it's playable!

There's a chance that a tile in front of a door may fall away resulting in you not being able to continue. It's a problem I wasn't able to solve in time for submitting as I chose to have dinner instead, so you'll just have to quit (Esc) and start a new game if you're unfortunate enough to have that happen (if it makes you feel better my dinner was very nice).
